Compliance Obligations 
3.1 Performance Reporting Requirements 
All developers must submit a QPR no later than the 15th calendar day following the end of each quarter.

QPR must include: 
- Site-wise energy generation (in kWh) 
- Grid availability and fault time (in hours) 
- Maintenance logs (digital, timestamped) 
- Smart meter data export summary (CSV/XML) 
- Developer sign-off with compliance officer details 
 
3.2 Metering Requirements 
All installations exceeding 25kW shall install GERB-certified smart meters by June 30, 2025.
- Calibration reports must be uploaded monthly to the MNRE portal.

Submission Portal & Contact 
- All reports must be uploaded via: https://mnre.gov.in/qpr-submission 
- File formats supported: .pdf, .xml, .csv 
- Contact for queries: compliance@mnre.gov.in
